text: Village Idiot is a 2012 album by Andreas Johnson.Svensk mediedatabas, accessdate: 23 January 2014 ==Track listing== (All songs written by Andreas Johnson and Peter Kvint except track 8, which was written by Andreas Johnson alone) #One Day #Lovelight #Stuck #Buzzin' #Paris #One Man Army #My Religion #So Cruel So You #Escape #The Greatest Reward #Amsterdam #Solace ==Chart positions== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (2012) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Sweden |align="center"|17Swedishcharts, accessdate: 23 January 2014 |} == References == ==External links== Category:2012 albums Category:Andreas Johnson albums
title: Village Idiot (album)
